channel.title: Equipping and unequiping exception Help?
channel.description:
Hi, I want to know, how would i make a exception, where only certain players can weild a weapon. If a regular player trys to weild it unequips. When the person with the exception weilds it equips normally. What would be the code for that and where would i place that code in the files?
If you helped, thanks alot.
Mr. Ferri

item.title: Equipping and unequiping exception Help?
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

download figmentscape v4.5 and search for attacker icon’s id(don’t know what it is by hand). and you should find what your looking for

Read full topic
